title: Lucky Lord: The Coin Pusher of Fate
description: Lucky Lord: The Coin Pusher of Fate combines slot-machine-style random strategy with roguelike card enhancement mechanics, creating a unique gameplay experience centered around a coin pusher.
longDescription:
<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# This is a medieval fantasy game with coin pusher as its core gameplay, blending slot machine-like randomness with rogue-like card mechanics.
<!--text-->
In a medieval age shrouded in darkness, you are the last hope of the territory: a lord bearing heavy responsibilities.

As night falls, deadly monsters emerge from the shadows, threatening the lives of the villagers.

To lead everyone to survival, **you decide... to take your talents... to the coin pusher!**

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# That's right, a Coin Pusher imbued with magical powers and featuring exciting, varied gameplay.
<!--text-->
Adventurers, magic, war beasts, and wondrous buildings are randomly drawn onto the board. Different cards trigger varied chain reactions.

From novice swordsmen to dragon-slaying heroes, from humble villages to wonderous constructions, from a lone man and his dog to a united force.

Use the coin pusher to summon heroes, forge weapons, build your home, unleash devastating chain damage, and overcome formidable foes.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Furthermore, we offer engaging and deep card deck-building.
<!--text-->
For a card game with randomness, the playability and strategic depth of deck-building are paramount.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# We provide 6 different lords with unique starting traits, over 150 cards, and more than 60 hero cards with diverse effects.
<!--text-->
You can form adventurer squads, let Hunters lead beast packs, have Mages unleash chain spells, let Thieves pilfer enemy treasures, or have Priests baptize children to expand the village.

Alternatively, go crazy raising chickens on the farm, plant infinite trees to become the Forest Guardian, become an Alchemist to boost farm yields, or mine resources to become a Mining Tycoon.

Rich card combinations paired with diverse hero enhancements allow you to explore your own unique builds. Every game offers a different experience.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Focus on the Coin Pusher, striving to uncover even more fun ways to play it.
<!--text-->
While learning from great games is part of gameplay design, our own unique perspective is essential.

As a game centered around the Coin Pusher, we strive to keep all focus within the pusher. There's no complex meta-progression. You can start a match anytime, without burden.

<!--image-->
![Lucky Lord: The Coin Pusher of Fate-1vt9y](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/c23cad1f5599435388606cdccf9e5c06/lucky-lord-the-coin-pusher-of-fate-1vt9y.gif)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Thank you for playing our game!
<!--text-->
We are a very inexperienced team of three. Every player who clicks on this page is our most precious and cherished friend.

Allow us to sincerely express our gratitude to you.

We will continuously update and maintain this game. According to our update plan, we will add more lords, cards, and hero gameplay in the future. We will also constantly optimize game balance and experience.

If you have any thoughts or suggestions about the game, please contact us.
